education_text.0: He studied the      Mathematical Tripos Mathematical Tripos at   In 1945, Wilkes was appointed as the second director of the      redirect    University of Cambridge Mathematical Laboratory University of Cambridge Mathematical Laboratory (later known as the Computer Laboratory)In 1972, Wilkes was awarded an honorary Doctor of Science by      Newcastle University Newcastle UniversityIn 1980, he retired from his professorships and post as the head of the Computer Laboratory and joined the central engineering staff of      Digital Equipment Corporation Digital Equipment Corporation in      Maynard, Massachusetts Maynard, Massachusetts, US
